item.title: Fix VMware kernel headers for versions not found
item.description: Ubuntu 18 的宿主机,核心 Update 了,然后要求重启,然后, VMware 起不来了, 报错: linux VM kernel headers 4.15.0-37-generic were not found So, Google and Sogou, and look: https://blog.csdn.net/ritterliu/article/details/7554183 http://www.vi-toolkit.com/wiki/index.php/Build_host_vmware_kernel_modules 长话短说,我运行了下面一行,然后就好了! ↓ sudo apt-get install linux-headers-$(uname -r) Good luck good day!
